The ground around Hydra exploded because of the intense cold and then the intense heat (it's true, you freeze a glass and then microwave it, it's explodes, same reason you never freeze hot coffee, the glass cracks).
Cryotek:
     Cryotek watched Hydra with curiosity. Then seeing Hydra coming for him he transformed into a previously unseen form, be became an odd mixture of a jet and a dragon. He took off at top speed, Mach 2. It was draining a lot of his energon supply though.
 aerosmith60@... wrote:Hydras snarled at the ice surronding him. Hovering off the ground he spun around his swords and flames destorying and evaporating the ice around him. He transformed into his two headed dragon mode. This enormous form was incredibly quick for its size. He flew up into the air and shot flames from bout heads.
